page.title: Business Current Account
page.tab:
Hong Leong Bank business current account is offered to business, corporate, and NGO customers who need to make frequent and large transactions.

Key Features and benefits:

  • Two currencies are available in USD and KHR.
  • Allows you to make payment through cheques
  • Overdraft is offered upon arrangement
  • Unlimited number of transaction withdrawals

Eligibility:

  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 500 or KHR 2,000,000
  • Minimum Balance requirement is USD 50 or KHR 200,000
  • This account is also applicable to non-individual
  • Requirement documents for Company:
  • Identification Documents of the Authorized Signatories and Board of director(s)
  • Certificate of Incorporation
  • Latest Memorandum and Articles of Association
  • Letter of Approval from Ministry of Commerce (MOC)
  • Annual Declaration
  • Latest Patent Certificate
  • Original Board of director(s) and shareholder(s) resolution
  • Other documentation is required depending on the type of institution.
